unitytranslate.open_browser.prompt: For UnityTranslate to transcribe your speech in Browser Transcription mode, your browser must be left opened to a website running locally. You may close your browser once you are no longer using UnityTranslate.
unitytranslate.transcriber.disconnected: Disconnected from Browser Transcription, please click here to reconnect.
unitytranslate.transcriber.error.too_man: Too many transcriber resets have occurred within a small timeframe, please restart your browser!
unitytranslate.transcriber.error.no_supp: Your browser doesn't support the Web Speech Recognition API! Please try using Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge instead.
unitytranslate.transcriber.type.sphinx.d: Uses the PocketSphinx speech recognition engine for speech transcription. Currently disabled due to its large size requirement.
Uses the Web Speech API for speech transcription. This requires opening your web browser for using it, and may use more resources. Mostly supports Google Chrome and Microsoft Edge.
unitytranslate.transcriber.type.windows_: Uses the Windows Speech API for speech transcription. This is natively supported in Windows, but requires you to install the language packs for the languages you intend to speak. Currently disabled due to requiring some research to set it up properly.
config.unitytranslate.client.enabled.des: Toggles whether the mod is enabled or disabled.
config.unitytranslate.client.muteTranscr: Mute Transcript when Voice Chat Muted?
If Simple Voice Chat / Plasmo Voice is muted, and this option is set to True, UnityTranslate will not transcribe audio while you are muted.
config.unitytranslate.client.openBrowser: When you join a world for the first time in a session, UnityTranslate will automatically open the browser for you without prompting you.
config.unitytranslate.common.batchTransl: To avoid stressing the translation instances, UnityTranslate sends the translations at a specific interval, which also helps avoid redundant translations.
config.unitytranslate.common.offloadServ: Additional translation servers running LibreTranslate for reducing strain on your computer.
The URL to a LibreTranslate server.
The API key for the LibreTranslate server. May be blank.
config.unitytranslate.common.shouldRunTr: Should UnityTranslate automatically start a local LibreTranslate server?
config.unitytranslate.common.shouldUseCu: Should the local LibreTranslate server utilize CUDA for accelerated translations? Only supports NVIDIA graphics cards.
config.unitytranslate.common.translatePr: In which order should be used for prioritizing translating.
unitytranslate.transcriber.browser.title: UnityTranslate Browser Transcription
unitytranslate.transcriber.browser.info: This webpage is used to recognize words uttered in speech without requiring to pay for the cloud service. This typically allows for better results and wider language support, however it may also utilize more resources.
unitytranslate.transcriber.browser.pause: This usually means the transcription crashed, or the game has been closed.%BR%If you are still currently using the Browser Transcription mode in UnityTranslate, please refresh the page.%BR%If this problem persists, please report the issue on %GITHUB%.
